  • Field Details

    • MAX_DET

      protected static final int MAX_DET
      Maximum detector number in table. The last 2 numbers (30 and 31) are reserved for ramp meter green count detectors.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • detector_num

      public int detector_num
      Detector number (0-31)
